issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Seem like the operator number instability issue to me that Pengcheng Xiong worked on that could occur with vectorization.

For now, turning off vectorization for:

TestMiniLlapLocalCliDriver.testCliDriver[explainuser_1]

TestMiniSparkOnYarnCliDriver.testCliDriver[spark_explainuser_1] 

Follow up Jira is HIVE-19351.
fields.summary: Vectorization: Turn off vectorization for explainuser_1.q / spark_explainuser_1
